channel.title: Hero on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Hero on My New Hugo Site

item.title: I lie to Batman
item.description: _Note: If you’re following me because you’re a code geek, like I am, and you want only my web design related feed and posts they have their own category now. _ I was asked the other night who my favourite comic book character is and anyone who knows me would answer without hesitation: Batman. They’d be close. It’s Robin all the way. Not Dick Grayson, Jason Todd, or Tim Drake - Robin.

item.title: Why I follow my heroes on Twitter
